name: Solar System (itch) (sumjoe)
description:
View our Solar System in 3D! Try to click on different celestial bodies to move the camera with them. But it might get tricky to follow them as your view shifts. Comets will start spawning in the first few moments of the game. Can you click them?! 

Note: If you're having a hard time and become disoriented, left-click on the sun or right-click anywhere to reset the camera. NOT recommended IF you're prone to motion sickness!

Credits

A project by Joseph Sumner
